name: Martin Šuba
title: javascript developer
about: Software engineer developing applications in Javascript/Typescript focused on web technologies. Specializes in front-end part of applications and websites. Has experience with many aspects of webdevelopment such as working with front-end frameworks, Node.js, REST API, developing browser extensions, writing unit tests, refactoring and building responsive and pixel perfect websites.

experience.title: Javascript Developer
experience.description: Taking care of front-end part of SaferPass password manager browser extension. Mostly working with javascript/typescript, angularJS, web extension API, web API, node.js. Implementing new features as well as refactoring legacy code and writing unit tests.

experience.title: Front-end web developer
experience.description: Building front-end of responsive cross-browser/platform web and mobile applications. Working mostly with HTML, SASS, Javascript, jQuery and frameworks like AngularJS, Angular and Ionic.

experience.title: Front-end web developer
experience.description: Creating web sites and user interfaces using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Cooperating with graphic designers and back-end developers. Working for clients like O2, Sberbank, SLSP, VÚB and Hyundai.

experience.title: Front-end web developer
experience.description: I focused mainly on coding web pages, coding e-mail newsletters, customizing WordPress templates and some other online marketing activities.
